# bin2chen

warden

OG Warden

Available for Hire

Focus Web3 Security | Solidity smart contracts

## Highlights

  * Ranked #32 on Code4rena all-time leaderboard

As of June 2023, I'm currently ranked #32 on Code4rena's all-time leaderboard,
having earned $99k+ in awards.

  * Ranked #5 on Code4rena 2023 leaderboard

As of June 2023, I'm currently ranked #5 on Code4rena's 2023 leaderboard.

  * Placed 1st in Code4rena Escher audit

In this audit, I found 3 high and 2 medium severity vulnerabilities.

## bin2chen's Activity

The Activity Stream is currently in beta. [Share feedback here](/help).

## Available for hire

[Get a quote](https://code4rena.typeform.com/solo-
audit#warden=bin2chen&source=bin2chen-profile)

  * [Twitter](https://twitter.com/bin2chen)
